features.description: Automated daily data collection via cron/GitHub Actions with logging and failure alerts
verification: GitHub Action or cron job config exists and runs fetch_news.py daily
Each run logs timestamp, articles fetched, new vs known count
Failures trigger a notification (GitHub Issue or email)
No duplicate entries accumulate across multiple runs

features.description: Replace flat JSON files with SQLite database, migration script, and API layer
verification: All 897+ existing incidents import via migration script
All JSON schema fields are represented as database columns
Query by any single field returns correct results
Date range query returns correct results
Frontend loads data from the API instead of static JSON

features.description: Date range picker and multi-select filters across all views with shareable URLs
verification: Date range picker filters by start/end dates
Multi-select dropdowns for state, threat type, school type, conveyance, outcome
Filters apply across map, charts, and incident list
URL parameters encode filter state; pasting URL restores filters
Clear all button resets all filters

features.description: Export filtered incident data as CSV and Excel from the incident list view
verification: CSV export downloads valid CSV with correct headers
Excel export downloads valid .xlsx file
Exported data matches the currently filtered view
Files open correctly in Excel and Google Sheets

features.description: Deploy site publicly with HTTPS, custom domain, SEO, and mobile responsiveness
verification: Site loads at configured domain over HTTPS
All views function correctly in production
Page load under 3 seconds on broadband
Mobile layout usable on 375px viewport

features.description: Entity-based matching with fuzzy matching, confidence scores, and review queue
verification: Entity-based matching groups articles by school + state + date + type
Fuzzy matching catches common name variations
Confidence score assigned to each potential match
Low-confidence matches held for manual review
False positive rate under 5%

features.description: Integrate at least one additional news API with plugin architecture and rate limiting
verification: At least one new source integrated alongside Google News RSS
New source follows same ingestion interface
Rate limits respected (no 429 errors)
Fetch statistics logged per source per run
